entry.question: Does the Upgrade I play have to be one of the cards I drew?
entry.answer: No. You can play any Upgrade in your hand after you scrap 2 cards from it.

entry.question: What happens if I have no other cards in my hand when I play Confidence?
entry.answer: You’ll draw 2 cards and them immediately scrap them. You won’t be able to play an Upgrade because your hand will be empty.
